projects.name: AWS 3-Tier Architecture With Terraform
projects.desc: Hands-on project: Deploy a secure 3-tier architecture on AWS using Terraform. Covers VPC, subnets, EC2, RDS, ALB, and Auto Scaling.
checklist: Create custom VPC with public/private subnets
Configure route tables, IGW, and NAT

projects.name: Host a Dynamic Web Application on AWS with Terraform
projects.desc: Advanced Terraform project: Deploy production-ready web app using Terraform. Learn S3 backend, DynamoDB state locking, Secrets Manager, ACM SSL, SNS, and ASG.
checklist: Configure Terraform backend and state locking
Deploy VPC, subnets, EC2, and RDS
Set up ALB and HTTPS using ACM SSL

projects.name: Production-Ready EKS Cluster Using Terraform
projects.desc: Project: Deploy secure AWS EKS cluster using Terraform with best practices, including Bastion host and networking configuration.
checklist: Deploy VPC and subnets for EKS
Configure worker nodes and security groups
Set up Bastion host for secure access

projects.name: AWS EKS Three-Tier Microservice Deployment with Prometheus & Grafana
projects.desc: Hands-on project: Deploy microservices on EKS using Terraform. Implement monitoring with Prometheus and Grafana.
